attributes.action: stop the use of Section 44 of the Terrorism Act to detain professional and amatuer photographers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People are being stopped from taking photographs in public places by use of anti-terrorism legislation. This clearly will have no effect on terrorism and is a serious infringement of civil rights. The BBC photographer Jeff Overs was a recent victim, when taking sunset photos over St Pauls Cathedral.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to stop the use of Section 44 of the Terrorism Act to detain professional and amatuer photographers.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=PhotoTerrorism


Her Majesty's Government
